cleaned_text: get a covid-19 vaccine today!b e a n m v pit's safe All the vaccines available right now are safe, even if you're pregnant. Most people who take the vaccine do not have any serious side effects. it's easy Vaccines are available in every county of the state, including without an appointment at some clinics and doctor's offices. Ask your doctor today. You can get vaccinated any day of the week and even in the evenings from others you trust, like your pharmacist. Find a vaccination location near you by visiting vaccines.gov. it's free Anyone 5 or older can get a vaccine AT NO COST! Medicaid clients get FREE transportation to get vaccinated. The vaccine visit will not count against Medicaid clients' 12 office visits limit each year. it's urgent Almost all the people hospitalized in Arkansas right now with COVID- 19 are unvaccinated.We all want things to go back to normal. Getting vaccinated is the best way to help make that happen.To learn more, visit ar.gov/mvpin your community Arkansas Medicaid Vaccination Program
